00001 //*********************************************************************
00002 // Fortran Interface to C++
00003 /*
00004 !USAGE:
00005   implicit none
00006   character (len=80) fname
00007   real(8) cyl(3),boozer(3),Bfield(3),epsTrunc/1d-6/,epsA/1d-4/,ficyl/0/
00008   integer(8) mcObj/0/         ! this variable holds the address of C++ object
00009   integer(4) False/0/,mcload
00010 
00011   EXTERNAL mcload,mcsetB0,mctruncate,mcsetAccuracy,mcsetB0,mccyl2mag
00012 ! Here EXTERNAL operator is used, but for true FORTRAN-90 program you have to
00013 ! use FORTRAN-statement INTERFACE for defining prototypes of subroutine called:
00014 !
00015 !   INTERFACE
00016 !    INTEGER(4) FUNCTION MCLOAD(mcObj,fname)
00017 !     INTEGER(8) mcObj
00018 !     CHARACTER *(*) fname
00019 !    END FUNCTION MCLOAD
00020 !   END INTERFACE
00021 
00022   fname = 'w7x-sc1.bc'
00023   if  (mcload (mcObj,fname)==False ) stop     ! stop if error
00024 
00025   call mctruncate   (mcObj,epsTrunc)          ! truncate spectrum
00026   call mcsetAccuracy(mcObj,epsA)              ! set accuracy of coordinate transformation
00027   call mcsetB0      (mcObj,2.5d0,ficyl)       ! scale B, set value of B on magn. axis
00028 
00029   cyl = (/6d0,1d-2,5d-1/)
00030 
00031   call mccyl2mag (mcObj,cyl,boozer,Bfield) ! coordinate transformation cyl -> boozer
00032 
00033   if(boozer(1) > 1)  print '(/a)', 'Point outside plasma!'
00034   print '(/a,3f14.6 )','cyl   = (r, fi, z)  =',cyl
00035   print '( a,3f14.6 )','boozer=(s,theta,phi)=',boozer
00036   print '( a,3f14.6/)','Bfield=(Br, Bfi, Bz)=',Bfield
00037 
00038   call mcfree(mcObj)                          ! destroy C++ object and free memory
00039   end
00040 */
00041 //

00263 template <class T> static inline T mmin (T x, T y) { return (x<y)?x:y; }
00264 template <class T> static inline T mmax (T x, T y) { return (x>y)?x:y; }
00265 
00266 static void strtrim(char *f)  // remove initial and trailing blanks
00267 {
00268   char *p,*p2;
00269   int i=strlen(f);
00270   for(p=f; p!=f+i-1; p++) if(*p!=' ') break;
00271   i=strlen(p);
00272   for(p2=p+i-1; p2!=p; p2--) if(*p2!=' ') {*(p2+1)=0; break; }
00273   memmove(f,p,p2-p+2);
00274 };
00275 
00276 // remove initial and trailing blanks from FORTRAN string: character(i) fname
00277 // size of dest must be large than fname
00278 static void strtrim(char *dest, char *fname, int i)
00279 {
00280   char *p;
00281   // remove initial blanks
00282   for(p=fname; p!=fname+i-1; p++) if(*p!=' ') break;
00283   i -= p-fname;
00284   strncpy(dest,p,i);
00285   dest[i]=0;
00286   // remove trailing blanks
00287   for(p=dest+i-1; p!=dest; p--) if(*p!=' ') {*(p+1)=0; break; }
00288 }

00306 //*********************************************************************
00307 // clone object  C3dMesh
00308 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT C3dMesh * STDCALL MCCLONE(C3dMesh **mConf)
00309 {
00310   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00311   return mc.clone();

00313 
00314 //*********************************************************************
00315 // create object  C3dMesh
00316 // and load magnetic coordinate data file: *.bc; *.bc_old; *.bin4; *.bin8
00317 // This function must be called before others.
00318 // The first call must be made with *mConf==0, the following calls
00319 //  will reload configuration into the same object
00320 //
00321 static int MC_load(C3dMesh **mConf, char * fname, int i, CStconfig::fileFormat fmt)
00322 {
00323   char *fn = new char[i+2];
00324   strtrim(fn,fname,i);
00325   if (*mConf==0) *mConf = new C3dMesh;   // create object C3dMesh and return to caller the address
00326   bool ok = (*mConf)->load(fn,fmt);
00327   if(!ok) {
00328     cerr << "MCLOAD: Loading error, file:'"<<fn<<"'\n";
00329     delete (*mConf);
00330     *mConf = 0;      // return NULL if errors
00331   }
00332   delete fn;
00333 //  (*mConf)->M3DpositionTestOff();
00334   return ok?True:False;
00335 }
00336 
00337 //*********************************************************************
00338 // create object  C3dMesh
00339 // and load magnetic coordinate data file: *.bc; *.bc_old; *.bin4; *.bin8
00340 // This function must be called before others.
00341 // The first call must be made with *mConf==0, the following calls
00342 //  will reload configuration into the same object
00343 //
00344 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCLOAD(C3dMesh **mConf, char * fname, int i)
00345 {
00346   return MC_load(mConf, fname, i, CStconfig::UNDEFINED);
00347 }

00471 //*********************************************************************
00472 // get PEST-coordinates 'pest' of the point lying on the B-line at poloidal angle 'thetaStar';  
00473 // the B-line is going through point pest0
00474 //
00475 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCSFLCOORDONBLINEATTHETA(C3dMesh **mConf, const double *pest0, 
00476                         const double *thetaStar, double *pest)
00477 {
00478   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00479   Vector3d mgc(pest0),b,grB,grs,grT,grP;
00480   Vector3d pst  = mc.SFLcoordOnBlineAtTheta(mgc, *thetaStar);
00481   pst.copyTo(pest);   
00482 }
00483 
00484 //*********************************************************************
00485 // Get PEST gradients in cylindrical coordinates
00486 // @param[in]  pest is the Boozer or PEST coordinate
00487 // @param[out] mag  is the Boozer coordinates (if input file is Boozer file) or 
00488 //  VMEC coordinates (if input file is VMEC-wout file)
00489 // @param[out] grad... are gradients at point pest
00490 // mConf must be originated from Boozer or VMEC file
00491 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCSFLCONTRABASIS(C3dMesh **mConf, const double *pest, 
00492                         double *gradS,double *gradThetaStar,double *gradPhi,double *mag)
00493 {
00494   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00495   Vector3d pst(pest),grS, grT, grP, mg;
00496   
00497   mc.SFLcontraBasis(pst,grS,grT, grP,mg);
00498  
00499   grS.copyTo(gradS);       // copy to array grads
00500   grT.copyTo(gradThetaStar);  
00501   grP.copyTo(gradPhi);    
00502   mg.copyTo(mag);     
00503 }
00504 
00505 //*********************************************************************
00506 // Get Boozer gradients in cylindrical coordinates
00507 // u    is the Boozer coordinate
00508 // mag  is the Boozer or VMEC coordinate
00509 // grad... are gradients at point u
00510 // mConf must be originated from Boozer or VMEC file
00511 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCBOOZERCONTRABASIS(C3dMesh **mConf, const double *u, 
00512                         double *gradS,double *gradThetaStar,double *gradPhi,double *mag)
00513 {
00514   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00515   Vector3d u1(u),grS, grT, grP, mg;
00516   
00517   mc.BoozerContraBasis(u1,grS,grT, grP,mg);
00518  
00519   grS.copyTo(gradS);       // copy to array grads
00520   grT.copyTo(gradThetaStar);  
00521   grP.copyTo(gradPhi);    
00522   mg.copyTo(mag);     
00523 }
00524 
00525 
00526 //*********************************************************************
00527 // Get gradients in cylindrical coordinates
00528 //  gradB  = grad(|B|) 
00529 //  gradF  = grad(torFlux)
00530 //  gradTh = grad(theta)
00531 //  gradPh = grad(phi) 
00532 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETBANDGRADIENTS(C3dMesh **mConf, double *magCoord, 
00533                      double *B,double *gradB,double *gradF,double *gradTh,double *gradPh)
00534 {
00535   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00536   Vector3d mgc(magCoord),b,grB,grs,grT,grP;
00537   
00538   mc.getBandGradients(mgc,b,grB,grs,grT,grP);
00539   double Fluxmax = mc.Flux(1.);
00540   Vector3d grF = grs*Fluxmax; // grad(torFlux)
00541 
00542   b.copyTo(B);             // B=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00543   grB.copyTo(gradB);       // copy to array gradB
00544   grF.copyTo(gradF);       // copy to array gradF
00545   grT.copyTo(gradTh);      // grad(theta)  in cyl. coord, theta is the poloidal angle
00546   grP.copyTo(gradPh);      // grad(phi)    in cyl. coord, phi is the toroidal angle
00547 }
00548 
00555 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETBCURLBGRADFCYL(C3dMesh **mConf, double *u, 
00556                      double *B,double *curlB,double *gradF)
00557 {
00558   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00559   Vector3d mgc(u),b,curl,grs;
00560   
00561   mc.getBcurlBGradscyl(mgc,b,curl,grs);
00562   double Fluxmax = mc.Flux(1.);
00563   Vector3d grF = grs*Fluxmax; // grad(torFlux)
00564 
00565   b.copyTo(B);             // B=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00566   curl.copyTo(curlB);      
00567   grF.copyTo(gradF);       // copy to array gradF
00568 }
00569 
00570 
00571 
00572 //*********************************************************************
00573 //  @return grad(|B|) in cylindrical coordinates
00574 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETGRADB(C3dMesh **mConf, double *magCoord, double *gradB)
00575 {
00576   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00577   Vector3d bz,gr;
00578   bz.setFrom(magCoord);   // copy magCoord to vector bz
00579   gr = mc.gradB(bz);
00580   gr.copyTo(gradB);       // copy to array gradb
00581 }
00582 
00583 //*********************************************************************
00584 // @return covariant components of  grad(|B|) in magnetic coordinates
00585 // dB/ds, dB/dtheta, dB/dphi
00586 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETCOVAGRADB(C3dMesh **mConf, double *magCoord, double *gradB)
00587 {
00588   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00589   Vector3d bz,gr;
00590   bz.setFrom(magCoord);       // copy booz to vector bz
00591   gr = mc.getCovaGradB(bz);
00592   gr.copyTo(gradB);       // copy to array gradb
00593 }

00595 //*********************************************************************
00596 // set average B on magn. axis
00597 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCSCALEB(C3dMesh **mConf, double *factor)
00598 {
00599   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00600   mc.scaleB(*factor);

00603 
00604 //*********************************************************************
00605 // Coordinate transformation
00606 // Input :
00607 //  cyl=(r,fi,z) - point in cyl. coordinates
00608 // Output:
00609 //  magCoord=(s,theta,phi)
00610 //  Bfield=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00611 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCCYL2MAG(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,double *magCoord,double *Bfield)
00612 {
00613   Vector3d c,b;
00614   c.setFrom(cyl);            // copy cyl to vector c
00615   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00616   if(mc.cylIsInside(c) ) {   // function cylIsInside returns 'TRUE' if the point lies inside LCMS
00617     b = mc.cyl2mag(c);       // b will be Vector3d(s,theta,phi)
00618     b.copyTo(magCoord);      // copy to fortran array
00619     b = mc.getBcyl();
00620     b.copyTo(Bfield);        // Bfield=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00621   }
00622   else {
00623     b = 0;
00624     b.copyTo(Bfield);
00625     b[0]=1e4;              // point lies outside plasma, set huge value of 's' as signal
00626     b.copyTo(magCoord);    // copy to array
00627   }
00628 }
00629 
00630 //*********************************************************************
00631 // Faster version of MCCYL2MAG, without testing whether point lies inside LCMS
00632 // Coordinate transformation
00633 // Input :
00634 //  cyl=(r,fi,z) - point in cyl. coordinates
00635 // Output:
00636 //  magCoord=(s,theta,phi)
00637 //  Bfield=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00638 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCCYL2MAG2(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,double *magCoord,double *Bfield)
00639 {
00640   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00641   Vector3d c(cyl),b;
00642   b = mc.cyl2mag(c);    // b is a Vector3d(s,theta,phi)
00643   b.copyTo(magCoord);      // copy to array
00644   b = mc.getBcyl();
00645   b.copyTo(Bfield);        // Bfield=(Br,Bfi,Bz) in cyl. coordinates
00646 }
00647 
00648 //*********************************************************************
00649 // Coordinate transformation
00650 // Input :
00651 //  xyz -- point in cartesian coordinates
00652 // Output:
00653 //  magCoord=(s,theta,phi)
00654 //  Bfield  in cartesian coordinates
00655 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCXYZ2MAG2(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *magCoord,double *Bfield)
00656 {
00657   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00658   Vector3d c(xyz),b;
00659   b = mc.xyz2mag(c);    // b is a Vector3d(s,theta,phi)
00660   b.copyTo(magCoord);      // copy to array
00661   b = mc.getBxyz();
00662   b.copyTo(Bfield);        // Bfield=(Bx,By,Bz) in cart. coordinates
00663 }

00856 //*********************************************************************
00857 // toroidal covariant component of B in Tesla*m
00858 // Tokamak's people name it as poloidal current function
00859 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT double STDCALL MCBPHI(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s)
00860 {
00861   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00862   double pi    = 3.14159265358979323846;
00863   double twopi = 2*pi;
00864   double mu0   = 4e-7*pi; // [N/A^2 = henry/m]
00865   double Bphi  = mc.Ip(*s)*mu0/twopi;
00866   return Bphi;
00867 }
00868

00872 {

00874   return mc.Ip(*s);
00875 }

00907                                                     double *torAngle,double *B,double *jac)

00914 
00915 //*********************************************************************
00916 // for A.Mishchenko
00917 // Rosenbluth-Hinton residual zonal flow for tokamak geometry
00918 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT double STDCALL MCRHPOTENCIAL(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s)
00919 {
00920   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
00921   double pi    = 3.14159265358979323846;
00922   double twopi = 2*pi;
00923   double mu0   = 4e-7*pi; // [N/A^2 = henry/m]
00924   double I  = mc.Ip(*s)*mu0/twopi;
00925   double L  = mc.NeoPolarization(*s);
00926   double R2 = mc.R2avrg(*s);
00927   double B_2= mc.B_2avrg(*s);
00928   double wrk = 1+I*I*L/( R2 - I*I*B_2 );
00929   return 1/wrk;
00930 }
00931

00935 {

00956 //*********************************************************************
00957 // flux average of (b/sqrt(1-x*b)) on the surface
00958 // f(s,x) = <b/sqrt(1-x*b)>, where 0<=x<=1, 0<=s<=1, and b=B(s,th,ph)/Bmax(s)
00959 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT double STDCALL MCROPARINVAVRG(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s,double *x)

00965 //*********************************************************************

00967 //   p_avrg(s,x) = <sqrt(1-x*B(s,th,ph)/Bmax(s))>, where 0<=x<=1, 0<=s<=1,
00968 // and definition of x is the following x=(1-p^2)/b, b=B/Bmax
00969 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT double STDCALL MCPAVRG(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s,double *x)
00970 {

00978 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT double STDCALL MCINTINVPAVRG(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s,double *x)

00981   return mc.integralInvPavrg(*s,*x);

01106 
01107 //*********************************************************************
01108 // Find intersection of the Ray with the last surface.
01109 // The ray is R(t)=r0+rd*t  with t>0
01110 // The origin of ray must be outside of the last surface
01111 //
01112 // INPUT:
01113 //   Real *8 R1(3)  -- the first(origin) and
01114 //   Real *8 R2(3)  --   the second point of the ray (cartesian coord.)
01115 // OUTPUT:
01116 //   Real *8 Entry(3) -- entry point of the ray into plasma (cartesian coord.)
01117 //   Real *8 Exit(3)  -- exit  point of the ray from plasma (cartesian coord.)
01118 //
01135 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCTRACELCMS(C3dMesh **mConf,double *R1,double *R2,
01136                                                 double *Entry,double *Exit)
01137 {
01138   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01139   Vector3d r1(R1),r2(R2); // 1st and 2nd points of the ray
01140   Vector3d r0(R1),rd(R2); // origin and direction of the ray
01141   rd  = r2-r0;            // direction of the ray
01142   rd /= rd.abs();         // normalize; the ray is r(t)=r0+rd*t  with t>0
01143   Vector3d ent(0.,0.,0.), ex(0.,0.,0.); // zero output
01144   ent.copyTo(Entry);
01145   ex.copyTo(Exit);
01146 
01147   if(!mc.isOK()) return -10;
01148   if(mc.xyzIsInside(r0)) return -2; // if TRUE then point r0 lies inside LCMS
01149 
01150   double dphi = 1*degree; // change this if you need more accurate calculations
01151 
01152   mc.traceLast(r0,rd,dphi,dphi);
01153 
01154   int size     = mc.getTraceSize();
01155   const Vector3d *R  = mc.getTraceRxyz();
01156   if(size==0) return -1; // ray does not enter in plasma
01157 
01158   ent = R[0];  // point where ray enters into plasma
01159   ex  = R[1];  // point where ray exits  plasma
01160   ent.copyTo(Entry);
01161   ex.copyTo(Exit);
01162 
01163   double r21 = (r2-r1).abs2();
01164   double e1 = (ent-r1).abs2();
01165   double x1 = (ex -r1).abs2();
01166 //  CRayTrace::freeTrace(); // ?
01167   if(e1> r21) return 0;  // segment r1--r2 is outside plasma
01168   if(x1> r21) return 1;  // only entry point lies on the segment r1--r2, i.e. r2 is inside plasma
01169   if(x1<=r21) return 2;  // entry and exit points lie on the segment r1--r2
01170   return 0;
01171 }
01172 
01173 //*********************************************************************
01174 // Find entry point of the Ray into the plasma(last closed surface)
01175 // The ray is R(t)=r0+rd*t  with t>0
01176 // It is assumed, that the origin of ray lies outside of the last surface
01177 //
01178 // INPUT:
01179 //   r0, rd  -- origin and direction of the ray in cartesian coordinates
01180 // OUTPUT:
01181 //  entryPoint
01182 //  @return  if the method succeeds, the return value is true; false otherwise.
01183 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCM3DGETRAYENTRYPOINT(C3dMesh **mConf, 
01184                                                           double *r0,double *rd, double *entryPoint)
01185 {
01186   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01187   Vector3d R0(r0),Rd(rd); // origin and direction of the ray
01188   Vector3d entry;
01189   bool b = mc.M3DgetRayEntryPoint(R0,Rd,entry);
01190   entry.copyTo(entryPoint);
01191   return b?True:False;
01192 }
01193 
01194 //****************************************************************************
01195 // create border 'slast' of last contour at cylindrical angle 'ficyl'
01196 // borderSize -- # of point in contour
01197 // ficyl -- cylindrical angle
01198 //  function returns 0 if no memory
01199 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCCREATEBORDER(C3dMesh **mConf,double *slast,double *ficyl,int *BrdSize)
01200 {
01201   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01202   bool b = mc.createBorder(*slast,*ficyl,*BrdSize);
01203   return b?True:False;
01204 }
01205 
01206 //****************************************************************************
01207 // MCCREATEBORDER must be callled first!
01208 // INPUT:
01209 //  REAL*8 XYZ(3) -- point in cartesian coordinates
01210 // OUTPUT:
01211 //  function returns 'TRUE' if the point lies inside Border
01212 //
01213 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCISINSIDEBORDER(C3dMesh **mConf,double *XYZ)
01214 {
01215   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01216   Vector3d xyz(XYZ);
01217   double rc = sqrt(xyz.x()*xyz.x()+xyz.y()*xyz.y());
01218   double fi = mc.mod2pi(atan2(xyz.y(),xyz.x()));
01219   double zc = xyz.z();
01220   Vector3d cyl(rc,fi,zc);
01221   bool b = mc.cylIsInsideBorder(cyl);
01222   return b?True:False;
01223 }
01224 
01225 //*********************************************************************
01226 // Get B and derivatives using
01227 // Program returns B and derivatives dB/dr, dB/dfi/r, dB/dz in point cyl
01228 //  Input:
01229 //    Real *8 cyl(3) -- cylindrical coordinates
01230 //  Output:
01231 //    Real *8 B(3) -- cylindrical coordinates of B
01232 //    Real *8 dBdr(3)   -- dB/dr, where dBdr(1)=dBr/dr, dBdr(2)=dBfi/dr, dBdr(3)=dBz/dr
01233 //    Real *8 dBdfir(3) -- dB/dfi/r
01234 //    Real *8 dBdz(3)   -- dB/dz
01235 //
01236 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETDBCYL(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,
01237                                                 double *B,double *dBdr,double *dBdfir,double *dBdz)
01238 {
01239   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01240   Vector3d c(cyl);
01241   Vector3d b,dbdr, dbdfir, dbdz, grads;
01242   double s = mc.getdBGradscyl(c,b,dbdr,dbdfir,dbdz,grads);
01243   b.copyTo(B);
01244   dbdr.copyTo(dBdr);
01245   dbdfir.copyTo(dBdfir);
01246   dbdz.copyTo(dBdz);
01247 }
01248 
01260 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCCOORDFIELDLINE(C3dMesh **mConf,double *mixCoord0,
01261                                                       double *fcyl,double *magCoord)
01262 {
01263   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01264   Vector3d mxCoord(mixCoord0);
01265   Vector3d mag = mc.mixCoordFieldLine(mxCoord, *fcyl);
01266   mag.copyTo(magCoord);
01267 }

01275 {
01276   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;

01281 //The function creates 3d-mesh.

01285                                                               double *dr,double *dz,double *dfi)
01286 {
01287   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;

01292 //*********************************************************************
01293 // get B and derivatives dB/dx,dB/dy,dB/dz in point xyz
01294 //  Input:
01295 //    Real *8 xyz(3) -- cartesian coordinates
01296 //  Output:
01297 //    Real *8 B(3) -- cartesian coordinates of B
01298 //    Real *8 dBdx(3) -- dB/dx, where dBdx(1)=dBx/dx, dBdx(2)=dBy/dx, dBdx(3)=dBx/dx
01299 //    Real *8 dBdy(3) -- dB/dy
01300 //    Real *8 dBdz(3) -- dB/dz
01301 //
01302 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETDBXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,
01303                                                    double *B,double *dBdx,double *dBdy,double *dBdz)
01304 {
01305   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01306   Vector3d R(xyz);
01307   Vector3d dbdx, dbdy, dbdz;
01308 
01309   Vector3d b=mc.M3DgetdBxyz(R,dbdx,dbdy,dbdz);
01310   b.copyTo(B);
01311   dbdx.copyTo(dBdx);
01312   dbdy.copyTo(dBdy);
01313   dbdz.copyTo(dBdz);
01314 }

01325 //    Real *8 dBdz(3)   -- dB/dz
01326 //

01371 //*********************************************************************
01372 //   function retuns grad(s) = Vector3d(ds/dr, ds/dfi/r, ds/dz)
01373 //  Input:
01374 //    Real *8 cyl(3) -- cylindrical coordinates
01375 //  Output:
01376 //    Real *8 grads(3) -- Vector3d(ds/dr, ds/dfi/r, ds/dz)
01377 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETGRADS(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,double *grads)
01378 {
01379   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01380   Vector3d R(cyl);
01381   Vector3d g=mc.M3DgetGrads(R);
01382   g.copyTo(grads);
01383 }

01389 //  Output:
01390 //    Real *8 grads(3) --  grads in cartesian coordinates
01391 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETGRADSXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *grads)
01392 {

01394   Vector3d R(xyz);
01395   Vector3d g=mc.M3DgetGradsxyz(R);
01396   g.copyTo(grads);
01397 }

01399 //*********************************************************************
01400 //   function retuns grad(s) in cartesian coordinates
01401 //  Input:
01402 //    Real *8 xyz(3) -- cartesian coordinates
01403 //  Output:
01404 //    Real *8 grads(3) --  grads in cartesian coordinates
01405 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETGRADSXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *grads)
01406 {
01407   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01408   Vector3d R(xyz);
01409   double s=mc.xyz2s(R);
01410   Vector3d g = mc.getGradsxyz();
01411   g.copyTo(grads);
01412 }

01439 //*********************************************************************
01440 // save mesh file
01441 // *.bin4; *.bin8 are supported
01442 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCWRITEMESH(C3dMesh **mConf,char * fname,int i)
01443 {
01444   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01445   char *fn = new char[i+2];
01446   strtrim(fn,fname,i);
01447   bool ok= mc.writeMesh(fn);
01448   if(!ok) cerr << "mcWriteMesh: writing error\n";
01449   delete fn;
01450   return ok?True:False;
01451 }

01454 //*********************************************************************
01455 // save magnetic coordinate file
01456 // *.bin4; *.bin8 are supported
01457 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCWRITE(C3dMesh **mConf,char * fname,int i)
01458 {
01459   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01460   char *fn = new char[i+2];
01461   strtrim(fn,fname,i);
01462   bool ok= mc.write(fn);
01463   if(!ok) cerr << "mcWrite: writing error\n";
01464   delete fn;
01465   return ok?True:False;
01466 }
01467 
01468 //*********************************************************************
01469 // get B and derivatives dB/dx,dB/dy,dB/dz in point xyz
01470 //  Input:
01471 //    Real *8 xyz(3) -- cartesian coordinates
01472 //  Output:
01473 //    Real *8 s (normalized toroidal flux), which normally satisfies \b 0<=s<=1;
01474 //            s>1 means that point lies outside from LCMS; 
01475 //    Real *8 B(3) -- cartesian coordinates of B
01476 //    Real *8 dB(9)
01477 //
01478 //    dB(1:3) -- dB/dx, where dB(1)=dBx/dx, dB(2)=dBy/dx, dB(3)=dBz/dx
01479 //    dB(4:6) -- dB/dy, where dB(4)=dBx/dy, dB(5)=dBy/dy, dB(6)=dBz/dy
01480 //    dB(7:9) -- dB/dz, where dB(7)=dBx/dz, dB(8)=dBy/dz, dB(9)=dBz/dz
01481 // 
01482 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETALLXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *s,
01483                                                     double *B,double *gradS,double *dB)
01484 {
01485   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01486   Vector3d R(xyz);
01487   Vector3d b,dbdx,dbdy,dbdz,gs;
01488 
01489   *s = mc.getdBGradsxyz(R,b,dbdx,dbdy,dbdz,gs);
01490   b.copyTo(B);
01491   gs.copyTo(gradS);
01492 //#define DB(row,col)  dB[(col)*3 + (row)] // Fortran77 style addressing
01493   dbdx.copyTo(dB);  // dB(i,j) = dB_i/dx_j
01494   dbdy.copyTo(dB+3);
01495   dbdz.copyTo(dB+6);
01496 }
01497 
01498 //*********************************************************************
01499 // get B and derivatives dB/dx,dB/dy,dB/dz in point xyz
01500 //  Input:
01501 //    Real *8 xyz(3) -- cartesian coordinates
01502 //  Output:
01503 //    Real *8 B(3) -- cartesian coordinates of B
01504 //    Real *8 dB(9)
01505 //    dB(1:3) -- dB/dx, where dB(1)=dBx/dx, dB(2)=dBy/dx, dB(3)=dBz/dx
01506 //    dB(4:6) -- dB/dy, where dB(4)=dBx/dy, dB(5)=dBy/dy, dB(6)=dBz/dy
01507 //    dB(7:9) -- dB/dz, where dB(7)=dBx/dz, dB(8)=dBy/dz, dB(9)=dBz/dz
01508 //
01513 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETALLXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *S,
01514                                                     double *B,double *gradS,double *dB)
01515 {
01516   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01517   Vector3d R(xyz);
01518   Vector3d b,dbdx,dbdy,dbdz,gs;
01519 
01520   *S = mc.M3DgetdBGradsxyz(R,b,dbdx,dbdy,dbdz,gs);
01521   b.copyTo(B);
01522   gs.copyTo(gradS);
01523 //#define DB(row,col)  dB[(col)*3 + (row)] // Fortran77 style addressing
01524   dbdx.copyTo(dB);  // dB(i,j) = dB_i/dx_j
01525   dbdy.copyTo(dB+3);
01526   dbdz.copyTo(dB+6);
01527 }
01528 
01529 //*********************************************************************
01530 // Coordinate transformation using 3d mesh interpolation
01531 // Find label of flux surface and B
01532 // Input :
01533 //  xyz -- point in cartesian coordinates
01534 // Output:
01535 // function returns label of flux surface -- normalized flux 's'
01536 //
01537 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETSBXYZ(C3dMesh **mConf,double *xyz,double *S,double *B)
01538 {
01539   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01540   Vector3d R(xyz);
01541 
01542   *S = mc.M3Dxyz2s(R);
01543   (mc.M3DgetBxyz(R)).copyTo(B);
01544 }

01546 //*********************************************************************
01551 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETALLCYL(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,double *S,
01552                                                     double *B,double *gradS,double *gradB)
01553 {
01554   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01555   Vector3d R(cyl);
01556   Vector3d b,dbdr,dbdfir,dbdz,gs;
01557 
01558   *S = mc.M3DgetdBGradscyl(R,b,dbdr,dbdfir,dbdz,gs);
01559   b.copyTo(B);
01560   gs.copyTo(gradS);
01561   dbdr.copyTo(gradB);  // dB(i,j) = dB_i/dx_j
01562   dbdfir.copyTo(gradB+3);
01563   dbdz.copyTo(gradB+6);
01564 }

01566 //*********************************************************************
01567 // Coordinate transformation using 3d mesh interpolation
01568 // Find label of flux surface and B
01569 // Input :
01570 //  xyz -- point in cartesian coordinates
01571 // Output:
01572 // function returns label of flux surface -- normalized flux 's'
01573 //
01574 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCM3DGETSBCYL(C3dMesh **mConf,double *cyl,double *S,double *B)
01575 {
01576   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01577   Vector3d R(cyl);
01578   *S = mc.M3Dcyl2s(R);
01579   if(*S<0) *S = mc.cyl2s(R);
01580   (mc.M3DgetBcyl(R)).copyTo(B);
01581 }

01584 //*********************************************************************
01585 //
01586 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETBMINMAX(C3dMesh **mConf,double *s,double *Bmin,double *Bmax )
01587 {
01588   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01589   if(*s>=0) {
01590     *Bmin=mc.Bmin(*s);
01591     *Bmax=mc.Bmax(*s);
01592   }
01593   else {
01594     *Bmin=mc.Bmin();  // global minimum
01595     *Bmax=mc.Bmax();
01596   }
01597 }

01602 {
01603   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01604   *Bmin=mc.Bmin();  // global minimum
01605   *Bmax=mc.Bmax();
01606 }

01718 //*********************************************************************
01731 
01732 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT int STDCALL MCSAVEREDUCED(C3dMesh **mConf, int *nsmax, double *eps, int *appendWrite, 
01733                                                   char * fname,int i)
01734 {
01735   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01736   char *fn = new char[i+2];
01737   strtrim(fn,fname,i);
01738    
01739   double  truncSav =mc.truncate();
01740   mc.truncate(*eps);
01741 
01742   bool append = appendWrite!=0;
01743 
01744   bool ok= mc.writeasciiReduced(fn, *nsmax,0,1,true,false,false,append);
01745 
01746   if(!ok) cerr << "mcSaveReduced: writing error\n";
01747   mc.truncate(truncSav);
01748   delete fn;
01749   return ok?True:False;
01750 }

01810 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCPEST2VMEC(C3dMesh **mConf,double *pest,double *vmec)
01811 {
01812   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01813   Vector3d p(pest);
01814   Vector3d v = mc.Pest2Vmec(p);
01815   v.copyTo(vmec);              
01816 }

01818 //****************************************************************************
01819 // @param[in]  vmec is the  VMEC coordinates =(s,theta,phi)
01820 // @param[out] pest  is the PEST coordinates
01821 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCVMEC2PEST(C3dMesh **mConf,double *vmec,double *pest)
01822 {
01823   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01824   Vector3d v(vmec);
01825   Vector3d p = mc.Vmec2Pest(v);
01826   p.copyTo(pest);              
01827 }

01850 //****************************************************************************
01851 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL SETARGV(int n,char * opt, int i)
01852 {
01853   char *op = new char[i+2];
01854   strtrim(op,opt,i);
01855   static std::vector<std::string> argv;
01856   std::string str=op;
01857 
01858   if(n==0) {
01859     argv.clear();
01860     argv.push_back(str);
01861   }
01862   else if(n>0) {
01863     argv.push_back(str);
01864   }
01865   else {
01866     const char **arg = new const char*[argv.size()];
01867     for(unsigned int i=0; i<argv.size(); i++) {
01868       arg[i] = argv[i].c_str();
01869     }
01870     // call c_main(argv.size(),arg);
01871   }
01872 }
01873 
01874 
01886 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCJINVARIANT(C3dMesh **mConf,double *mag,double *dphi, int *iotaDenominator, 
01887                                                       double *Jinv, double *Tbounce, double *Bt)
01888 {
01889   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01890   Vector3d v(mag);
01891   std::vector<double> j = mc.Jinvariant(v,*dphi,*iotaDenominator);
01892   Jinv[0] = j[0];
01893   Jinv[1] = j[1];
01894   Jinv[2] = j[2];
01895   *Tbounce = j[3];
01896   *Bt      = j[4];
01897 }
01898 
01908 extern "C" WINDLLEXPORT void STDCALL MCGETMAGCOORDATB(C3dMesh **mConf,double *mag,double *Bt,double *magBt)
01909 {
01910   C3dMesh &mc = **mConf;
01911   Vector3d v(mag);
01912   Vector3d m = mc.getMagCoordAtB(v, *Bt);
01913   m.copyTo(magBt);               // copy to array magBt
01914 }

01918 {

01920   mc.useMixedProductForJacobian(*yesNo>0?true:false);
01921 }
